Package net.chaossquad.mclib.command

package net.chaossquad.mclib.command
  • Zugehörige Packages
    Package
    Beschreibung
    net.chaossquad.mclib
     
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    DynamicSubcommandProvider
    The dynamic subcommand provider can be used to add/remove subcommands to SubcommandCommands right when the player is typing/executing the command.
    SubcommandCommand
    A command that can has multiple commands as subcommands.
    You can add subcommands with
    ungültiges @link 
    {@link this#addSubcommand(String, SubcommandEntry)
    }.
    You can remove subcommands with
    ungültiges @link 
    {@link this#removeSubcommand(String)
    }.
    You can set a global permission for the command in the constructor
    You can set a DynamicSubcommandProvider that can provide subcommands dynamically in the constructor.
    You can override
    ungültiges @link 
    {@link this#onExecutionWithoutSubcommand(CommandSender, Command, String)
    } to run code when the command is executed without subcommands.
    SubcommandEntry
    A subcommand entry represents one command that was added to SubcommandCommand.
    TabCompletingCommandExecutor
    This class is a combined CommandExecutor and TabCompleter.
